lyrics:
8 contributorshow it feels to fly lyricsverse 1
have you ever felt so strong
that it made you feel weak
long days long nights and you just cant sleep
have you ever been so sure
that it gave you cold feet
that you felt on edge you can feel your heart beat

chorus
well i never knew this feeling never
now i hope it stays and lasts forever
i am riding high
dont wanna come down
hope my wings dont fail me now
if i can touch the sky
id risk the fall just to know how it feels to fly

refrain
yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah
say yeah yeah yeah yeah
yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah
say yeah yeah yeah yeah
yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah
yeah

verse 2
have you ever felt so lost
but didnt know til you were found
looking everywhere but you finally see now
in a room full of people
feel like no ones around
got your head in the clouds and your feet up off the ground
you might also likechorus
say i never knew this feeling never
now i hope it stays and lasts forever
i am riding high
dont wanna come down
hope my wings dont fail me now
and if i can touch the sky
id risk the fall just to know how it feels to fly

bridge
yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah
say yeah yeah yeah yeah
yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah
say yeah yeah yeah yeah
yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah
we get to go high
higher high
higher
higher

chorus
i am riding high
dont wanna come down
hope my wings dont fail me now
if i can touch the sky
id risk the fall just to know how it feels to fly
i am riding high
dont wanna come down
hope my wings dont fail me now
if i can touch the sky
id risk the fall just to know how it feels to fly
outro
yeah yeah yeah yeah
yeah yeah yeah yeah
yeah yeah yeah yeah
yeah yeah yeah yeah
foreverembed
